about_the_game:
Set in a mysterious, sci-fi world, where a formiddable creature called the protojinz is set to wreak havoc, you must become a hexmaster, a being from this sci-fi world with unique abilities called morphs, and battle this fiend in a simulated battlefield of falling tetroes. Infused with powerful hexes, you must form these tetroes into streams to deal damage quickly to the protojinz, for given the chance, he will be ruthless and devastating in attack.
Line up your tetroes, evolve and enhance your morphs, discover new and amazing hexes, and battle the fierce protojinz in this unique puzzle roguelike.

Key Features:

  • Captivating gameplay mechanics: Tetrocombat takes the mechanics inspired by falling block games and adds fun, special twists to them to produce strategic and exhilarating gameplay.
  • Poweful hexes: Effects combined into the falling tetroes that dramatically impact the attacks that you launch on the protojinz.
  • Diverse protagonists: Select one from a collection of creatures possessing powerful morphgenes. Defeat the protojinz in rounds of battle to evolve these morphgenes and unlock spectacular abilities, which when used in tandem with different hexes can create powerful synergies that can dominate battles.
  • A ruthless enemy: A dominant conqueror, the protojinz possesses a barrage of potent attacks and a huge amount of health. With unique abilities, he manipulates the battlefield like no other, making him the ultimate opponent.
  • Dynamic Battles: Hexes, morphs and tetroes are all randomized, giving you unique battles every time.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Tetrocombat is a sci-fi, falling block, roguelike. Select your hexmaster and battle the mighty protojinz by combining falling "tetroes" infused with powerful hexes into lines to deal damage. Upgrade your hexmaster with unique effects to radically enhance your strategy and defeat the protojinz.
